data.name: Twilight Wars
data.detailed_description:
The Free Prologue

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1714850/Twilight_Wars_Declassified/


About the Game






The second half of the 21st century. Major international corporations have got out of control of governments and thrown off the shackles of law and morality. Now each of them is a state.

Due to the absence of a deterrent, industrial espionage, theft of technology, and the assassination of rivals are becoming frightening. In the shadow of a quiet everyday life, a full-scale war for information, technologies and resources is unfolding.

The only opponent of the new masters of the world was the Anonymous Arbitration Agency (Triple-A), an independent secret service created to protect people from corporate madness and to regulate their twilight wars from the shadows. However, the activity of Triple-A interfered with too many - in a swift attack, the unknown assailants destroyed all the bases and neutralized almost all the operatives.

The only survivors are Shi - the artificial intelligence that runs the organization - and you. The future fate of the Agency and the whole world depends on you two! Together with Shi, you will have to revive Triple-A, find the mysterious opponents who destroyed your comrades and strike back at the corporations that have gained power.



Expand your sphere of influence by building and improving your base, recruiting the best agents, and training them, completing missions. This world does not tolerate weakness - show your strength!



  • A Dungeon Crawler set in a world of spy cyberpunk: tactical turn-based battles, dangerous missions, and irreversible death of agents in a world that is entangled with spy networks.
  • Original art style: Immerse yourself in a cozy Russian cyberpunk atmosphere.
  • It is not only a matter of the decisions you make on the battlefield but also your interaction with other characters that has an impact on the future of the Agency and the entire world.



  • A squad for any playing style: 8 agents with unique specializations, each with their advantages and disadvantages, as well as a flexible class development system and synergistic skills between specialists are available. Choose the right squad for you from hundreds of possible combinations.
  • Think ahead: missions are dynamically bound, therefore, your decisions affect how complex and how rich the rewards you receive will be. Consider risky decisions or act carefully, but remember - mistakes can cost a lot!
  • Monitor each agent's level of stress and loyalty, take into account their fears and quirks, as well as the relationships within the team. You could avoid mission failure, specialists leaving the agency, or even their death if you do this.



  • The Old Guard of the agency. Engage 8 agents from the special ops team "Mediator" for service and use their unique abilities.
  • In the era of cyberpunk, energy is as valuable as oxygen: provide your agents with enough batteries to recharge before a mission; otherwise, weapons and implants will no longer function, some skills will not be available, and the comm for contacting your squad will fail.

Awards and Nominations

  • Indie Cup W'21 | Nominee "Best Unreal Engine Game" + "Best Art"
  • Narrative In Games 2021 HSBI | Winner for "Franchise Ready" + "The Best Scenario"
  • Wanna Join Game Dev 2020 HSBI | Winner for "Best Art"
  • Unreal Engine DEV Contest 2020 | Winner for "Choice of Belka Games"

Social Networks

Social Networks
data.short_description: Twilight Wars is a dungeon crawler set in a cyberpunk world where secret agents battle for corporate interests. Bring back a secret organization, recruit and equip a team of specialists - and eliminate those who stand in your way!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.2+ Compliant
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.2+ Compliant or higher
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
